pages.pdf_tools__detail_description_object__me: Combine PDF files to create a single document online for free. It’s easy to merge PDFs with our PDF combiner. No watermarks and no file size limits.
Merge multiple PDFs into one in seconds.
Drag & drop your PDFs to start—easy!
Works on Mac, Windows, Android, and iOS.
Simple Online Tool To Combine PDFs

Merge PDF allows you to quickly combine multiple PDF files into one single document. All it takes is a drag, a drop, and a few clicks. The PDF Merger is free to use; you don't even need to register for an account.
Local Safe PDF Merge
All files you upload are processed in your browser for complete privacy. They are not uploaded to the cloud, ensuring absolute security and privacy.
Works on Windows, Mac, & Linux

Our PDF combiner is browser-based. This means that it doesn't matter whether you're a Mac, Windows, or Linux user or visit us using your mobile device. You can freely merge your files with MaxAI.me PDF tools.
Easy PDF-Combining With a Preview
When you upload your PDFs into Merge PDF, we'll provide you with a preview function. There, you can rearrange or delete single pages and files. You can also add more PDFs here to combine.
Merge PDFs Reliably

You don't need to purchase expensive software to combine PDF files. The MaxAI.me PDF tool is available for free online use, running in a browser without uploading to the network to ensure that your files and data are always secure.
Local Processing

A key feature of our service is that all PDF merging operations are carried out locally. This ensures that the entire processing procedure takes place directly on your device without the need for cloud-based waits. It enhances security and guarantees reliability.
How To Merge PDF Files Online:
Drag & drop your files into the online Merge PDF tool.
Rearrange individual pages or entire files as needed.
Add more files, rotate, or delete pages or whole files.
Click “Confirm to merge” to combine and download your PDF.

pricing.features_data__llama_3_1_70b__tooltip: Powered by Meta. 128,000 max tokens. A powerful multilingual model with significantly expanded context length and enhanced reasoning capabilities. pricing.features_data__llama_3_1_405b__tooltip: Powered by Meta. 128,000 max tokens. The world's largest openly available foundation model, rivaling top closed-source AI in general knowledge, steerability and math. Supports 8 languages and enables advanced capabilities like synthetic data generation and model distillation. Ideal for long-form summarization, multilingual conversational agents, and coding assistants.
pricing.features_data__mistral_large_2__tooltip: Powered by MistralAI. 128,000 max tokens. Mistral's latest flagship model pushes the boundaries of speed and performance. With 123 billion parameters, Mistral-Large-2 excels in code generation, mathematics, and reasoning across dozens of languages. It offers minimal hallucination and impressive multilingual support for both natural and programming languages.
